description: This file declares the DobbySpecGenerator class responsible for generating JSON specifications for container configurations in a runtime environment. It includes methods for creating environment variables, mounts, plugins, and other container configuration elements based on application and runtime configurations.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: Class responsible for generating container specification JSON objects based on application and runtime configurations. It provides methods to create environment variables, mounts, plugins, and other configurations necessary for container runtime setup.

methods.name: DobbySpecGenerator
methods.description: Constructor for DobbySpecGenerator class.

methods.name: virtual ~DobbySpecGenerator
methods.description: Destructor for DobbySpecGenerator class.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generates a JSON string representing the container specification based on provided application configuration and runtime configuration.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates environment variable JSON object from application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates mount points JSON object from application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates RDK plugin configurations JSON object.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates minidump plugin configuration JSON object.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates application service SDK plugin configuration JSON object.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates network plugin configuration JSON object.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates a bind mount JSON object with source, destination, and options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines if GPU should be enabled based on application configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Calculates system memory limit based on application and runtime configs.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Calculates GPU memory limit based on application and runtime configs.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (Video Processing Unit) features are enabled.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Retrieves CPU core information as a string.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates plugin configurations into the provided JSON spec.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ethan log plugin JSON configuration.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates multicast socket plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ion Memory plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates Thunder plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates OpenCDM plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates private data mount JSON configuration.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates FKPS mount points for the container spec.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates a tmpfs mount point JSON configuration.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates resource manager mount configuration.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Retrieves the working directory configuration.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes Ion heaps JSON data (likely internal use).

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes a URL string.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds hole punch port information to the container spec JSON.
